definitions.definition: To live in a tent or similar temporary accommodation.
definitions.example: We're planning to camp in the field until Sunday.

definitions.definition: To afford rest or lodging for.
To stay in an advantageous location in a video game, such as next to a power-up's spawning point or in order to guard an area.
definitions.example: Go and camp the flag for the win.

definitions.definition: To fight; contend in battle or in any kind of contest; to strive with others in doing anything; compete.
The recreational activity of temporarily living in a tent or similar accommodation, usually in the wilderness.
definitions.example: Camping is a favorite summer activity.

definitions.definition: The act of setting up a camp.
